riskOfRelics:BlastShower.NAME: Blast Shower
riskOfRelics:BlastShower.DESCRIPTION: riskofrelics:Equipment NL Remove all of your debuffs. NL riskofrelics:Charges: !CHARGES!

riskOfRelics:Crowdfunder.NAME: The Crowdfunder
riskOfRelics:Crowdfunder.DESCRIPTION: riskofrelics:Equipment NL At the start of your turn, lose 4 gold and deal 3 damage to a random enemy, !M! times. NL riskofrelics:Charges: !CHARGES!

riskOfRelics:missileLauncher.NAME: Disposable missile launcher
riskOfRelics:missileLauncher.DESCRIPTION: riskofrelics:Equipment NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL riskofrelics:Charges: !CHARGES!

riskOfRelics:tonicAffliction.NAME: Tonic Affliction
riskOfRelics:tonicAffliction.DESCRIPTION: Reduce damage and Block by 20% when drawn.

riskOfRelics:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
riskOfRelics:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

riskOfRelics:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
riskOfRelics:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
riskOfRelics:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

riskOfRelics:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
riskOfRelics:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

riskOfRelics:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
riskOfRelics:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [E] times. NL (Deal !riskOfRelics:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

riskOfRelics:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
riskOfRelics:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSki.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable and !riskOfRelics:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
